Spoiler: Opening Flavour
--A Bar in Corteleona, 1932--


The Great Depression, so called, was hitting everyone hard. Corteleona was no exception. Not even the tiniest of towns could escape its clutches. The Mafia weren’t feeling it, though. The murder trade was economy-proof, and it always would be.

Three men meet at the bar. The bartender asks them their poisons. One orders vodka on the rocks, one bourbon neat and the other a perennial whiskey. As they drink the night away, there are lowly murmurs of killing someone. They wanted to take over Corteleona, and the best way to do that was to kill them all.

Spoiler: Vanilla Townie PM; you know at least one person in the game received this.
Welcome to Corteleona, RichardGHP. Your quaint little village has been invaded by mafiosi from Sicily. Get rid of them before they get rid of you!
You are a Citizen, aligned with the Town. You have no special abilities, so your only power is your vote. You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and at least one town player is alive. Confirm in thread.

Rules:

0: Site rules and applicable laws apply.
1: Be civil to each other and to your moderator.
2: Play to the best of your ability and towards your win condition.
3: If it’s not in the game thread, don’t quote, post, or link it.
4: Do not discuss this game outside of this thread unless I specifically tell you that you can.
5: Absolutely no hidden/hard to read text or cryptography and preferably no steganography.
6: When you die, you are dead. No posthumous posting is allowed until the game is completed.
7: Discussion may continue among living players during twilight. The exception to this is if the deadline elapses, in which case all activity must cease immediately.
8: Votes should follow the format VOTE: RichardGHP or something similar. Unvotes are not required.
9: Days will last no more than two weeks; nights will last 48 hours. No majority, no lynch. No action submitted, none taken. Extensions will only happen if a replacement is needed.
10: I will prod you after 72 hours of inactivity and replace you after a further 24 hours. You are allowed two grace prods, and a third results in replacement. Being prodded twice in one game-day will also result in your replacement.
11: Blue is my colour. Do not use it other than for analytical purposes.
12: Don’t do anything you know is unacceptable. If in doubt about something, ask me.
13: By signing up to play, you agree to abide by these rules and accept the consequences for violations thereof. All rights are reserved by the game moderator.
14: Have fun!
All Role PMs have been sent. I will start Day 1 once 10 players have confirmed. When a player confirms, I will bold their name in the OP.

A so-called random vote is one made very early in the game with no serious reasoning given.
